author: kilasuit
body:
As per below 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6355225/61582976-d9f17680-ab29-11e9-9459-4511262c1751.png)


should either be replaced to a try v7 or should similarly point to a generic messages similar to  change made https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/9775/

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @PowerShell/powershell-committee reviewed this, we agree that this needs to be updated in Windows PowerShell by the time PS7 comes out.  Thanks!

title: Post GA of v7 - Update 5.1 pointer to try v6
